tool_description:
You can perform high quality natural language processing (NLP) including:
1. Sentiment recognition
2. Summary of articles 
3. Intent of social media comments
4. Top topics/key words
name: Textrator NLP
title: Textrator NLP

api_list.name: Social Media
api_list.description: Get the sentiment and intent of a comment on social media/email/website/app.

api_list.name: Summarize URL
api_list.description: Summerize an article from a link.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: url of the article to summerize.

api_list.name: Article Sentiment from URL
Financial Facts from URL
api_list.description: Get financial facts embedded in the article. Pass parameters as text or url.
